attributes.action: Ban the sale of fireworks in supermarkets and other shops.
attributes.additional_details:
The Government should do this as the general public are suffering because of idiots getting their hands on / or being sold to people underage. 

I am fed up of hearing stories day in and out of them being fired at peoples homes, businesses, cars and in many cases at people. 

Fireworks can also create a lot of distress for pets and small children. I see no issue with displays being held properly and safely in local communities by their local councils but private sales must stop.
attributes.background: I would like the UK Government to ban the sale of fireworks in supermarkets and other shops.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign these petitions:

Limit the Sale and Use of Fireworks to Organisers of Licensed Displays Only
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891

Stop the sale of fireworks to the general public.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557780
